mapper.select: SELECT ID, APP_PATH as appPath, STATUS, CREATED, CREATER FROM app_uploaded ORDER BY CREATED DESC
SELECT ID, APP_PATH as appPath, STATUS, CREATED, CREATER FROM app_uploaded WHERE CREATER = #{developerId} AND STATUS > 0
SELECT ID, APP_PATH as appPath, STATUS, CREATED, CREATER FROM app_uploaded WHERE ID = #{id} LIMIT 0, 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO app_uploaded (ID, APP_PATH, STATUS, CREATER, UPDATED) VALUES (#{id}, #{appPath}, 2, #{creater}, now())
mapper.delete: UPDATE app_uploaded SET STATUS = 0, UPDATED = now() WHERE ID = #{id}
